source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Learn Cinema 4D: Low Poly Tree

visible_instructors.title: Jonathan Lam
visible_instructors.name: Jonathan
visible_instructors.job_title: Marketing Artist | Concept Artist | Graphic Designer

items.headline: Start learning Cinema 4D by creating a beautiful Low Poly tree in this quick and easy course.
objectives_summary: Create basic 3D models in Cinema 4D
Light a 3D scene
Render 3D scenes in Cinema 4D

items.title: Learn the Animation Pipeline for Game Characters in Unreal 4

visible_instructors.title: 3dmotive LLC
visible_instructors.name: 3dmotive
visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality 3d and Game Art Training by Industry Pros!

items.headline: Take your animated characters from Maya - to moving around in your level in Unreal Engine 4
objectives_summary: Import characters into Unreal Engine 4
Set up character Blueprints to accept input
Understand basic animation systems in the Unreal Engine

items.title: Stop Motion Object Animation Using Davinci Resolve & Bandlab
items.headline: You will discover how to create basic stop motion object animations using Davinci Resolve and Bandlab.
objectives_summary: This Is A Basic Animation For Beginners Using Free Software Course.
Learn the basics of Davinci Resolve
Learn the basics of Bandlab

items.title: Cinema 4D Complete : Vol. 2. All about Modeling!
items.headline: Master the polygon modeling, create any object you want
objectives_summary: All about modeling in Cinema 4D
Selecting, moving, scaling, rotating polygons precisely
Using splines to create intricate design

items.title: Adobe After Effects: Futuristic Motion Graphics & Animation
items.headline: Master the tools you need to conquer any project in just 1.5 hours!
objectives_summary: Create, from scratch, a rectangular graphic
Create, from scratch, a circular graphic
Animate using basic keyframes and simple expressions

items.title: Motion Graphics Design & Flat Animation in After Effects CC

visible_instructors.title: Video Course Center Inc.
visible_instructors.name: Video Course Center
visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality Training: Motion Graphics, Video Editing

items.headline: Become a Motion Graphics designer in After Effects. Learn top techniques to start your career as a Motion Graphic artist
objectives_summary: Download all project files and start creating your first Motion Graphics project
Understand the basics of After Effects & Illustrator
Create professional Motion Graphics in After Effects step-by-step

items.title: Learning 3ds Max after knowing Maya : Modeling

visible_instructors.title: Bradley Wascher
visible_instructors.name: Bradley
visible_instructors.job_title: 3D Environment Artist in Video Game Industry

items.headline: Learn how to use 3ds Max if you already know how to use Maya. Switching was never easier.
objectives_summary: Overview of fundamental UI differences
Location of most used tools and techniques for modeling
Explaining high poly to low poly workflow

items.title: VFX Color Grading and Re-Lighting in Nuke - NK404
items.headline: Learn a variety of advanced VFX Compositing and Color Grading Techniques in Nuke.
objectives_summary: Advanced Color Grading Techniques
Day to Night Tips and Techniques
Fundamentals of Light and Physics

items.title: Learn 3D Facial Rigging For Beginners in 3ds Max
items.headline: 3D Facial Rigging: Build the Skills Needed to Start Rigging you Own Characters' Faces TODAY
objectives_summary: How to build a facial skeleton with a dual jaw bones to get more flexibilty.
How to skin your model and use the skin modifier's features to improve the deformations.
How to build a fleshy eye rig to simulate sliding around the eyelids.

items.title: Background Design
items.headline: Creating Art for Animation
objectives_summary: Become an Animation Background Artist
Create Colour Concepts for Background Art and Design
Learn the techniques of digital art and concept painting

objectives_summary: Professional lighting set-ups in Cinema 4D
Pro tips on creating realistic lighting
Studio Lighting techniques

items.title: Creating and animating character with clothes 3ds Max and MD
items.headline: Series of video-lectures how to easily and in short time create cool character using 3ds max and Marvelous Designer
objectives_summary: Create supercool character in short time!
Create and animate clothes for any character you've created!
Visualize  your characters in the best perfomance!

items.title: Surfacing a Datsun 240Z with Rhino 3D ( V6 or V5 ) Level 2
items.headline: Level 2 design classe from Rhino 3D Tutorials
objectives_summary: Level up to a more in depth learning of Rhino 3D' s surfacing tools.

items.title: Vray Materials with 3ds Max + Vray : The Quickest Way

visible_instructors.name: Jake

items.headline: Create a Library of Realistic Materials that you can use over and over again in 3ds Max and Vray in under 60 minutes.
objectives_summary: Create realistic materials from scratch
Learn the value of systems and how to use them
Improve your 3D rendering quality

items.title: Animate Hipster Logos & Badges in After Effects
items.headline: Step-by-step guide to designing and animating a fun badge logo using Adobe Illustrator and Adobe After Effects.
objectives_summary: You'll be able to design a professional-looking badge with free templates.
You'll be able to prepare an Adobe Illustrator file for animation in Adobe After Effects.
You'll be able to animate your badge in a variety of eye-catching ways.

items.title: The Cloth Simulation Guide in Blender 2.8
items.headline: Learn all about the Cloth Simulation in Blender 3D!
objectives_summary: The students will be able to use the cloth simulation efficiently
The students will have a complete understanding of the cloth simulation
The students have improved there Blender skills
